mapper.insert: INSERT INTO experiment_project (name, category, description, level, image_url, video_url, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{category}, #{description}, #{level}, #{imageUrl}, #{videoUrl}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE experiment_project SET name = #{name}, category = #{category}, description = #{description}, level = #{level}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, video_url = #{videoUrl}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM experiment_project WHERE (#{category} IS NULL OR category = #{category}) AND (#{level} IS NULL OR level = #{level}) AND (#{keyword} IS NULL OR name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
